hadesmod:WeaponCharger.NAME: Snapshotter
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add #b1 #yCamera into your hand.

hadesmod:WeaponGenerator.NAME: Ultimate Camera
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] At the start of each turn, add #b1 #yCamera into your hand.

hadesmod:BrokenCamera.NAME: Broken Camera
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL Upon pickup, lose #b2 random #yWeapons.
